================================ = Solenopsis SFDC Utility Tool = ================================
Targets -------
Generate a package.xml with every element specified: ant [-Dsf.packageDir="directory to generate package.xml"] [-Dsf.version="version to generate"] -f ${ant.file} generate-package-full
Generate a package.xml with asterisk elements where appropriate: ant [-Dsf.packageDir="directory to generate package.xml"] [-Dsf.version="version to generate"] -f ${ant.file} generate-package
